title: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Novak Djokovic celebrates winning the singles final against Roger Federer during the Wimbledon 2019 at All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club on July 14 in London. Hide Caption 1 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos The US women's national soccer team celebrates their World Cup win at City Hall in New York after a ticker tape parade on Wednesday, July 10. Hide Caption 2 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Simona Halep poses for a photo with the trophy after winning the Wimbledon final against Serena Williams. Hide Caption 3 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Ghanaian fans prepare soccer match between Ghana and Tunisia in the Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt on Monday, July 8. Hide Caption 4 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Jos Buttler, Mark Wood, Moeen Ali, Jonny Bairstow, Adil Rashid and Chris Woakes of England celebrate after defeating New Zealand in the 2019 Cricket World Cup Final on July 14 in London. Hide Caption 5 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Los Angeles Angels players cover the mound with Tyler Skaggs No. 45 jerseys after the Angels defeated the Seattle Mariners in a no-hitter on July 12 at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, California. Skaggs died July 1. Hide Caption 6 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Melisa Wu and Emily Chinnock of Australia compete in the final of the women's 10m synchro platform on Day 3 of the 2019 FINA World Championships at Nambu International Aquatics Centre on July 14 in Gwangju, South Korea. Hide Caption 7 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Roger Federer looks on during his match against Novak Djokovic in the men's singles final of the Wimbledon Tennis Championships in London on July 14. Hide Caption 8 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Lewis Hamilton celebrates after winning the British Grand Prix on Sunday, July 14. Hide Caption 9 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Cyclists ride in the countryside during the third stage of the Tour de France between Binche, Belgium and Epernay, France, on Monday, July 8. Hide Caption 10 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Players participate in the Stand Up To Cancer initiative during the 2019 MLB All-Star Game at Progressive Field on July 9 in Cleveland, Ohio. Hide Caption 11 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos France's Tony Yoka celebrates after winning his heavyweight boxing match against Germany's Alexander Dimitrenko, left, on July 13 in Antibes, southern France. Hide Caption 12 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge; Meghan, Duchess of Sussex; and Pippa Middleton applaud the presentation after the final of the ladies' singles during the Wimbledon Tennis Championships on July 13, in London. Hide Caption 13 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Bill May of the US competes during the 2019 FINA World Championships in Gwangju, South Korea. Hide Caption 14 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Serena Williams reacts during her match against Simona Halep in the Wimbledon final on Saturday, July 13. Hide Caption 15 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Wei Lu and Jiaqi Zhang of China compete in the women's 10m synchro platform final on Day 3 of 2019 FINA World Championships, in Gwangju, South Korea. Hide Caption 16 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos India's captain Virat Kohli reacts after a missed run out attempt during the 2019 Cricket World Cup semifinal between India and New Zealand in Manchester, England, on Tuesday, July 9. Hide Caption 17 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Pete Alonso of the New York Mets reacts during the Major League Baseball Home Run Derby, Monday, July 8, in Cleveland. Hide Caption 18 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Colombia's Juan Sebastian Cabal and Robert Farah, on the ground, celebrate winning the Wimbledon men's doubles final against France's Nicolas Mahut and Edouard Roger-Vasselin on Saturday, July 13. Hide Caption 19 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Alex Morgan, Megan Rapinoe, and Allie Long celebrate during the US Women's National Soccer Team Victory Parade and City Hall Ceremony on July 10 in New York City. Hide Caption 20 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Venezuela's Yulimar Rojas in action during women's triple jump competition at the IAAF Diamond League Monaco on Thursday, July 11. Hide Caption 21 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Dayana Yastremska of Ukraine plays a forehand against Shuai Zhang of China during the seventh day of play at Wimbledon on Monday, July 8. Hide Caption 22 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Algeria's forward Baghdad Bounedjah cries as he celebrates after winning the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (CAN) quarter final football match against Ivory Coast at the Suez Stadium in Egypt. Hide Caption 23 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Team Mexico competes during 18th FINA World Championships in South Korea. Hide Caption 24 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Ty Taypotat, of Regina, Saskatchewan, rides AKA during bareback rodeo action at the Calgary Stampede in Calgary, Canada, on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 25 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Houston Astros centerfielder Jake Marisnick collides with Los Angeles Angels catcher Jonathan Lucroy on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 26 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Barbora Strycova and partner Su-Wei Hsieh celebrate match point in their ladies' doubles final against Gabriela Dabrowski and Yifan Xu during the Wimbledon Tennis Championships on Friday, July 12. Hide Caption 27 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Geovany Paz of Cuba competes in the men's long jump at the International Athletics Meeting in Lucerne, Switzerland, on Tuesday, July 9. Hide Caption 28 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos A memebr of the Singapore team competes during the 18th FINA World Championships in South Korea. Hide Caption 29 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Brazil's Gabriel Jesus fights for the ball with Peru's Miguel Angel Trauco during the final match of the Copa America in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on Sunday, July 7. Hide Caption 30 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge speaks with the Wimbledon groundsmen during the final day of the tennis championship in London. Hide Caption 31 of 32
description: Take a look at 32 amazing sports photos from July 7 to July 14.
